title: murugA ini unnai
sahitya:
murugA in unnai oru pOdum aDiyEn maravAda mati tannaip-pere vENum ayyanE


anupallavi

  sharaNAgatarAga varuvOr anaivarum paramAnandamurap-parivODu aruLum


caraNam    kudittODik-kumaindu vADum manam kodittup-padaikkAdun padattin nizhal nADi
tudittup-pADiyE en tuyarODat-tuNai tEDum matiyE tAn enakku gati aLikkum ayyanE
